title: SOLD: raw T202 "Nearly Caught" Johnny Bates & Bob Bescher...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: raw T202 "Nearly Caught" Johnny Bates & Bob Bescher...
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Cigarettes card with the "Nearly Caught" center panel with Bates and Bescher on either flank.

It would technically be considered poor due to a small tear.  It is visible to the right of Johnny Bates's head.  It does present very nicely for the relative condition.

$SOLD net to me, postpaid via fortified PWE in the continental U.S. $SOLD via bubble mailer. Your choice.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations. :rolleyes:

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/t206/71725/t202[/IMG]

I’ll take it via bubble mailer


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
